Reviews.Title: “Genio Hotel -- Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: frettingmom
Reviews.Content: hotel facility facelift fairly clean dated location superb steps famous piazza navona enjoy outdoor cafes activities season taxi stand literally outside front door hotel walk street catch hop hop bus approx 19 euro allday pass famous sites highly suggest red bus expect green blue bus fall hotel charming rooftop cafe enjoy free breakfast view sites city downside hotel concierges extremely helpful dont information buses trains fares activities recommend friends concierge restaurant atmosphere music wine suggested accidentally stumbled piazza navona trying restaurant piazza met requirements recommend hotel centrally located reasonably priced believe value ciao

Reviews.Title: “Great location and comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: Lisa686
Reviews.Content: spent week bed double bed bed didnt wasnt modern fancy basic met clean safe nice nice breakfast roof top antipasti mozarella regular bread cheese yoghurt eggs bacon looking staff friendly bathroom cleaned day electricity troubles noice outside sometimes loud window closed hear people talking passing hear elevator trouble getting baby stroller elevator maybe able walk steps stairs breakfast location excellent walking distance sights busy nightlife restaurants block easy pop sightseeing dinner neighbourhood safe enjoyed stay definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Three Generations (a 25, 44 and 73 year old went to Rome).”

Reviews.Content: hotel positioned heart rome able access sites foot vatican 10 minute walk river colosseum 25 minute walk sites spanish steps trevi fountain 10 minutes hotel fantastic roof terrace throughout stay matter time day night terrace views vatican spanish steps stunning sites hotel opulent elegantly decorated classic italian style decorated standard reception staff speak perfect english happy help providing map arrival directions various sites breakfast substantial takes 6th floor shares views roof terrace noise street effect sleep trip noise expected city lovely piazza 2 minutes walk hotel fantastic atmosphere strongly recommend hotel maximise time rome stay return fantastic hotel city seen believed

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience again”
Reviews.Author: byrdrish
Reviews.Content: stayed ago liked time appeared redecorated staff exceptionally helpful advise transportation hotel train station helped print boarding passes trip home attractively furnished nice size breakfast served rooftop charming view excellent location course perfect piazza navona walked st peters piazza del popolo spanish steps trevi fountain pantheon countless restaurants immediate vicinity watched sunset afternoon pretty rooftop terrace fifth trip rome return stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location Great View”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeB3
Reviews.Content: block piazza navona easy walk vatican coliseum trevi fountain perfect spot explore rome foot terrific shopping dining alleys square staff helpful breakfast incredible roof top view hard beat reasons definitely stay shower tiny water tempature constantly changes elevator tiny slow shape stairs youre option 5th floor wifi clean comfortable definitely outweighs inconveniences limited mobility

Reviews.Content: stranded rome result volcanic dust cloud wife daughter leave rented apartment booked period chance wandered hotel knowledge expectations hotel hotel provided pleasant experiences extended stay double single reasonably sized immaculately clean excellent modern bathrooms complete powerful showers rear hotel view meant quiet indeed appreciated roof terrace unparalleled views rome proved restful retreat stress trying home hotels comfortable lounge computers available guests proved invaluable tvs receive english speaking news programs stay sheets towels changed daily breakfast adequate staff polite helpful times reception staff gianluca fabio spoke excellent english german french professional helpful sorting phoned embassies behalf guests spoke italian travel agents regarding railway alternatives regularly kept contact updated information hotel receptionists nightmare hotel guests booking according everchanging contradictory news reports staff reassuring accommodate requirements definitely stay hotel
